row.process:
:INCLUDE PCK.AUTOMIC_DMTOOL.PUB.INCLUDE.ATTACH :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHANGE_DIRECTORY_TO_AGENT_BIN
:SWITCH &$PLATFORM# :CASE "WINDOWS" ! insert these lines in your script to determine if an error occurred ! @set retcode=%errorlevel% ! @if NOT %ERRORLEVEL% == 0 goto :retcode !
:INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_CMDLINE_CMD@WINDOWS :SET &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = &UC4RB_DYN_PROPS# :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_CHARS@WINDOWS :SET &UC4RB_DYN_PROPS# = &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# :INCLUDE PCK.AUTOMIC_DM.PRV.INCLUDE.EXECUTE_GENERAL_WORKFLOW :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_CMDLINE_CMD@WINDOWS
:CASE "UNIX"
:INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_SHELL_CMD@UNIX :SET &UC4RB_DYN_PROPS# = STR_SUBSTITUTE (&UC4RB_DYN_PROPS#, '"', '\"') :INCLUDE PCK.AUTOMIC_DM.PRV.INCLUDE.EXECUTE_GENERAL_WORKFLOW :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_SHELL_CMD@UNIX
:OTHER
:ENDSWITCH
